attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: some people have to use 4x4 veichles for many good reasons terrain, work,recreation, to name just a few do not class all 4x4 users as chelsea tractor drivers, a land/range rover type car is not in the same leauge as the porche and mercadies this type of 4x4 are fasion statements not practical 4x4 cars

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
